thread.title: Gay Couples Can Be ‘Positive And Nurturing’ Parents
thread.title_full: Gay Couples Can Be ‘Positive And Nurturing’ Parents - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Gay Couples Can Be ‘Positive And Nurturing’ Parents
text: Rick Santorum has had a remarkably tumultuous relationship with the LGBT community, which is why many will be surprised that the Republican presidential hopeful conceded that gay couples could potentially be viable parents while appearing on The View Wednesday morning. Rick landed on the topic of gay families after being questioned about marriage equality by...
